startPage.title: Welcome to Event Planner!
startPage.subtitle: Manage your tommorrow.
startPage.creationDescription: Create new events in all details including, title, description, date, time, location, category, picture and priority of an event.
startPage.editingDescription: Easily edit already created events by changing data in corresponding edit form.
startPage.sortingDescription: You can sort events by name, date or priority.
startPage.searchingDescription: Use powerful search functionality by entering keywords, making it easy to locate a relevant event.
startPage.filtrationDescription: Events can be filtered based on categories, including art, music, business, conference, workshop, party and sport.
startPage.deletionDescription: Delete events one by one or you can delete all of them by navigating to your profile page.

success.signupSuccessful: Registration successful. Please check your email to verify your account.

error.emailTaken: The email has already been taken.

loginPage.resendVerificationLink: Resend verification link to your email?

homePage.noEventCreated: You don't have events. Create the first one.

success.successfulVerification: Your email is verified successfully! Now, you can log in!

error.invalidUrl: Invalid email verification link. Please request a new one.
error.internalServerError: An unknown error occurred. Please try later.

notFoundPage.noPageFoundTitle: Sorry, we could not find that page

modalMessages.deleteEvent: Are you sure, you want to delete this event?
modalMessages.deleteAllEvents: Are you sure, you want to delete all your events?
modalMessages.deleteProfile: Are you sure, you want to delete your profile with all your events?
modalMessages.logOut: Are you sure, you want to log out?
